You can pre-define a tagging vocabulary: You can pre-define a tagging vocabulary for this project by copying and pasting terms into the text area below, one term per line.
The terms will appear as autocomplete op: The terms will appear as autocomplete options when users create new tags in the annotation interface. Please note that users will still be able to add their own tags, too.
open-join-info: With 'Open Join' switched on, any registered user can join your project without an invitation.
open-edit-info: With 'Open Edit' switched on, any member of your project can edit the default assignment.
